channel.title: [508] Zoom / Move the camera - NEED HELP!
channel.description:
I think it is client sided, but is it possible, to make a 508 client wich can Zoom / move the camera, like Moparscape and some other 317 Clients..
If searched the whole forum, and no one have a solution. :eek:
If it can, does someone have a script or client or tutorial? (I prefer a HD Client, but a SD (Low Detail) Client is also good)
NOTE: I'm not an expert of Java, I have no idea how I can code this whole thing! :O
